recommendations: Kokil Gupta “I had the pleasure to work with Shreeyash for about a year. He is very helpful and cooperative. His knowledge about his work, grasp of things and clarity of thought are commendable. He’s an enthusiastic, highly responsible and dedicated professional who works on any project with extreme diligence and efficiency. I wish him all the luck for a successful career”

Aditi Sharma “It was a pleasure working under Shreeyash during my internship at Accenture. His understanding of the US Healthcare industry and his approach to addressing any project taught me a lot. He involved me thoroughly in the assignments, made me realize the areas where I could improve, and helped me develop my knowledge and consulting skills. He made me understand the intricacies of the organization in the best way possible, and he made sure that there was no ambiguity in the reporting relationship with the managers. He is an organized, hardworking, and friendly person, and it was a fabulous experience to have worked with him!”
